p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
p.span:
Greetings.
There is a change to the current schedule for food distribution.
Food will be available for pick-up on ONLY Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays.
Two days worth of meals will be served on Mondays and Wednesdays and Friday service will provide meals for Friday, Saturday and Sunday.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
p.span: Please note the new time that food will be available. It is for only one hour.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

span.style: font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; font-size: x-large;

p.span: Meals must be picked up by a parent/guardian. Proof of parent/guardian status is required to pick up meals.
